mapper.select: select * from parking_class inner join parking_class_group on parking_class.ClGrpiDx = parking_class_group.GrpiDx order by CliDx
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking_class (ClId, ClPW, ClName, ClUser, ClTel, ClEmail, ClDCName1, ClDCTime1, ClDCRate1,ClDCName2, ClDCTime2, ClDCRate2,ClDCName3, ClDCTime3, ClDCRate3,ClDCName4, ClDCTime4, ClDCRate4,ClDCName5, ClDCTime5, ClDCRate5,ClDCName6, ClDCTime6, ClDCRate6,ClDCUse, ClMemo, ClGrpiDx) VALUES(#{ClID}, #{ClPW}, #{ClName}, #{ClUser} #{ClTel},#{ClEmail},#{ClDCName1},#{ClDCTime1},#{ClDCRate1},#{ClDCName2},#{ClDCTime2},#{ClDCRate2},,#{ClDCName3},#{ClDCTime3},#{ClDCRate3},,#{ClDCName4},#{ClDCTime4},#{ClDCRate4},,#{ClDCName5},#{ClDCTime5},#{ClDCRate5},,#{ClDCName6},#{ClDCTime6},#{ClDCRate6},#{ClDCUse},#{ClMemo},#{ClGrpiDx});
